## Aufgabe: SWISS

### Analysemodell

```{r fig_1, echo=FALSE}
DiagrammeR::grViz("
digraph {
  graph [layout = circo]
  node [shape = circle]
    A [label = 'Fertility']
    B [label = 'Agriclture']
    C [label = 'Examination']
    D [label = 'Education']
    E [label = 'Catholic']
    F [label = 'Infant Mortality']
  edge []
    B -> A
    C -> A
    D -> A
    E -> A
    A -> F
    C -> B
    D -> C
    D -> B
}
")
```
